entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with 40 percent chance of snow. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023
